Title: Butterfly Kiss
Writer: Frank Cottrell Boyce, Frank Cottrell Boyce (idea), Michael Winterbottom (idea)
Actors: Amanda Plummer, Kathy Jamieson, Saskia Reeves, Des McAleer
Plot: Eunice is walking along the highways of northern England from one filling station to another. She is searching for Judith, the woman, she says to be in love with. It's bad luck for the women at the cash desk not to be Judith, because Eunice is eccentric, angry and extreme dangerous. One day she meets Miriam, hard of hearing and a little ingenuous, who feels sympathy for Eunice and takes her home. Miriam is very impressed by Eunice's fierceness and willfulness and follows her on the search for Judith. Shocked by Eunice's cruelty she tries to make her a better person, but she looses ground herself.
